author: vshang
body:
#### PR description:

Added default HCal FB LUT parameters for LLP trigger to base caloParams class to prevent CMSSW crashes when using older caloParams files which do not explicitly contain HCal FB LUT parameters. No changes expected to behavior of rest of CMSSW.

#### PR validation:

Successfully generated CaloL1 config settings key using old version of caloParams file that did not contain HCal FB LUT parameters and confirmed output was correct. Also confirmed that changes did not affect generation of correct CaloL1 config settings key with newest version of caloParams file.
title: Updating base caloParams class with HCal FB LUT parameters
